text.p: Prices on the New York Stock Exchange ended sharply higher in active trading Friday.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 94.72 points to 7071.20. It rose 332.33 for the week, a record.
The NYSE Composite rose 7.26 to 422.97. It rose 22.59 for the week, a record.
The average price per share rose $0.73.
Volume was 499,730,640 compared with 459,341,810 on Thursday. Volume for the week was 2,478,660,640.
